entry.content:
The Verge

Good, knowledgeable sources make this reporting possible, and I take their trust seriously. If you have more to share about what’s happening at Sonos or other tech brands, you can message me confidentially and securely with Signal at chriswelch.01 or 845-445-8455. Alternatively, you can reach me via email at welch@theverge.com or through Instagram或者.
